other_tests.findings: Led to earlier diagnosis of necrotizing fasciitis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Statistically significant improvement in mortality compared with cases diagnosed on clinical grounds alone.

other_tests.findings: Diagnosis confirmed through serology; elevated IgG and IgM titers.
30 WBCs (88% lymphocytes), 6 RBCs, protein level of 40 mg/dL, glucose level of 72 mg/dL, elevated myelin basic protein level at 13.6 ng/mL.
